head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ANAGNOST, ARTHUR LORING

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ANAGNOST, ARTHUR LORING

block.p: ANAGNOST-Arthur Loring. On Sunday June 4, 2000. Age 82. Of Towson, MD passed away at the Blakehurst Retirement Community. Beloved husband of Virginia Montgomery (nee Choate) Anagnost. Brother of Harold Anagnost of Bricktown, NJ, uncle of William Anagnost of NJ, Richard Anagnost of ND and Janice Anagnost-Topper of NYC. A memorial service will be held on Wednesday, June 7 at 11AM at the Trinity Episcopal Church, 120 Allegheny Avenue, Towson, MD. Interment private. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to the Hospice of Baltimore, 6601 North Charles Street, Baltimore MD 21204.
